TEXT.TITLE: KUWAIT SAYS IT HAS FULL GULF ARAB SUPPORT
TEXT.BODY: Kuwait, whose shipping has come under repeated attack by Iran, has the full support of Saudi Arabia and other Gulf allies, a senior government official said. Cabinet spokesman Abdul-Aziz al-Otaibi, quoted by the Kuwaiti news agency KUNA yesterday, said Foreign Minister Sheikh Sabah al-Ahmed al-Sabah had told cabinet he had found "complete support...At this delicate phase" during visits to Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) states. The GCC, an economic and military alliance which has generally supported Iraq over Iran, comprises Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates. REUTER
